meanings.definition: To place something over or upon in order to protect or conceal.
meanings.sent1: Please cover the cake with a lid to keep it fresh.
meanings.sent2: She used a blanket to cover herself from the cold.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky cat tried to cover its tracks by walking in circles.
meanings.sent4: His lies could not cover up the truth forever.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds cover the sky, blocking the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A thing that lies on, over, or around something, especially in order to protect or conceal it.
meanings.sent1: The picnic cover shielded us from the rain during the storm.
meanings.sent2: The book cover had a beautiful illustration on it.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a cover off the table to reveal a hidden rabbit.
meanings.sent4: The cover of the magazine featured a famous actress.
meanings.sent5: The car cover protected the vehicle from dust and debris.

meanings.definition: To deal with or include something.
meanings.sent1: We need to cover all the topics in the meeting agenda.
meanings.sent2: The teacher will cover the new lesson tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The chef had to cover for the missing cook in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: She can cover the shift if you need time off.
meanings.sent5: The news report will cover the latest developments in the story.

meanings.definition: To travel a certain distance or area.
meanings.sent1: The marathon runners will cover 26 miles in the race.
meanings.sent2: The delivery truck will cover the route from the warehouse to the store.
meanings.sent3: The explorer planned to cover the entire jungle in a week.
meanings.sent4: The bird can cover long distances during migration.
meanings.sent5: The bus will cover the distance between the two cities in two hours.

meanings.definition: To be enough to pay for something.
meanings.sent1: His savings will cover the cost of the new computer.
meanings.sent2: The scholarship will cover her tuition fees for the semester.
meanings.sent3: The bonus will cover the expenses of the family vacation.
meanings.sent4: Her salary can cover the monthly rent and utilities.
meanings.sent5: The insurance policy will cover the damages from the accident.
